problem.p: There are 5 red balls and 3 blue balls of identical size and shape in a bag.

ul.li: Pick one ball at random, what is the size of the sample space for color \(X\)?
If \(P(X = \text{blue}) = 0.4\) after another two balls are added into the bag, how many blue balls are added?
If \(P(X = \text{blue}) = 0.5\) after two balls are removed from the bag, how many blue balls are removed?
